instructions: Lightly brown bacon in large skillet over medium heat, about 4 to 5 minutes. Add onions and chiles, saute until onion is golden brown, 5 to 6 minutes. Stir in tomato and beans and allow to simmer for 10 minutes.
ingredients: 2 (15.8 ounce) cans BUSH'S® Pinto Beans, drained and rinsed
title: BUSH'S® Frijoles a la Charra
